TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MenuStrip extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip

span.span: Provides a menu system for a form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是取代的顶级容器 。 is the top-level container that supersedes . 它还提供了键处理和多个文档界面 (MDI) 功能。It also provides key handling and multiple document interface (MDI) features. 功能 和一起 工作， 尽管它们是从派生的 。Functionally, and work along with , although they are derived from . 以下各项专用于 在所有方向上无缝使用和 。The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both and in all orientations. 默认情况下，它们在设计时可用于 控件：They are available by default at design time for the control: - - - 控件表示窗体的菜单结构的容器。The control represents the container for the menu structure of a form. 您可以将 对象添加到 表示菜单结构中各个菜单命令的。You can add objects to the that represent the individual menu commands in the menu structure. 每个 可以是应用程序的命令或其他子菜单项的父菜单。Each can be a command for your application or a parent menu for other submenu items. 替换并扩展了 在 .net Core 3.1 中移除的控件。The replaces and extends the control, which was removed in .NET Core 3.1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 (MDI) 方案的多文档界面中的。The following code example demonstrates a in a multiple-document interface (MDI) scenario. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Misc#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Misc/CS/Program.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Misc#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Misc/VB/Program.vb#10)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否支持溢出功能。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the supports overflow functionality.

value.span: 如果 支持溢出功能，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the supports overflow functionality; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有足够空间在中显示菜单项，溢出功能会将菜单项移动到下拉菜单 。The overflow feature moves menu items to a drop-down menu when there is not enough room to display them in a . 将 属性设置为时 `true` ，还必须通过设置属性来启用特定菜单项的溢出 。When you set the property to `true`, you must also enable overflow for specific menu items by setting the property. 默认情况下，如果菜单项无法在可用空间内容纳，则不会显示它们。By default, menu items are not displayed if they cannot fit within the available space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性设置控件之间的内部空间。Use the property to set the interior space between controls. 如果控件是项的容器，则填充表示容器边缘的空间。When a control is a container of items, padding represents the space from the edge of the container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性总是返回 `false` ，这是因为工具提示通常不用于菜单或菜单项。The property always returns `false` because typically, ToolTips are not used for menus or menu items.

[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Misc#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Misc/CS/Program.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Misc#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Misc/VB/Program.vb#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MenuActivate As EventHandler

summary.span: 用户使用键盘或鼠标访问菜单时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user accesses the menu with the keyboard or mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当通过 ALT 键激活时， 或 通常不会从当前具有焦点的控件中执行焦点，也不会删除焦点。When activated by the ALT key, the or typically neither take nor remove the focus from the control that currently has the focus. 如果在或的下拉控件中承载了一个控件 ，则当用户按 TAB 键时，控件将获得焦点。If there is a control hosted within the or a drop-down of the , the control gains focus when the user presses the TAB key. 通常， 当键盘激活时，可能不会引发、、和事件。In general, the , , , and events of might not be raised when they are activated by the keyboard. 在这种情况下， 请 改用和事件。In such cases, use the and events instead. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `MenuStrip1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MenuStrip1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#489](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#489)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#489](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#489)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MenuDeactivate As EventHandler

span.span: Occurs when the is deactivated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当通过 ALT 键激活时， 或 通常不会从当前具有焦点的控件中执行焦点，也不会删除焦点。When activated by the ALT key, the or typically neither take nor remove the focus from the control that currently has the focus. 如果在或的下拉控件中承载了一个控件 ，则当用户按 TAB 键时，控件将获得焦点。If there is a control hosted within the or a drop-down of the , the control gains focus when the user presses the TAB key. 通常， 当键盘激活时，可能不会引发、、和事件。In general, the , , , and events of might not be raised when they are activated by the keyboard. 在这种情况下， 请 改用和事件。In such cases, use the and events instead. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `MenuStrip1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MenuStrip1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#490](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#490)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#490](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#490)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnMenuActivate(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnMenuActivate (e As EventArgs)
abstract member OnMenuActivate : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnMenuActivate : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: An that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void WndProc (ref System.Windows.Forms.Message m);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void WndProc(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& m) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub WndProc (ByRef m As Message)

span.span: The Windows to process.
Processes Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过方法进行筛选后，所有消息都将发送到 方法 。All messages are sent to the method after getting filtered through the method. 方法与 Windows `WindowProc` 函数完全对应。The method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function. 有关处理 Windows 消息的详细信息，请参阅 [WindowProc 回调函数](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms633573)。For more information about processing Windows messages, see [WindowProc callback function](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms633573). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法以处理结构中标识的操作系统消息 。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the structure. 在此示例中处理 WM_ACTIVATEAPP 操作系统消息，以了解其他应用程序何时变为活动状态。The WM_ACTIVATEAPP operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. 请参阅位于的平台 SDK 文档参考， 了解可用的 、 和 值。Refer to the Platform SDK documentation reference located at to understand the available , , and values. 可以在 "平台 SDK (Core SDK" 部分中包含的 windows .h 标头文件中找到实际常数值，) 下载，也可以在文档中找到该文件。Actual constant values can be found in the windows.h header file included in the Platform SDK (Core SDK section) download, which is also available on Docs. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/VB/form1.vb#1)]

para.span: 继承控件应调用基类的 方法来处理其不处理的所有消息。

span.span: Inheriting controls should call the base class's method to process any messages that they do not handle.
